function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Granger causality test results suggest a potential causal relationship between pandemic and Gini","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the causal relationship could lead to incorrect policy decisions","Mitigation":"Conduct further research and analysis to confirm the causal relationship","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and econometric analysis","People":"Policy makers, economists, public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Changes in welfare policies may impose large welfare losses on high-wage workers","Impact":"Reduced welfare for high-wage workers and potential negative impact on aggregate income","Mitigation":"Careful consideration of the welfare policies and their impact on different income groups","Technologies":"Economic modeling and simulation tools","People":"Policy makers, economists, labor force non-participants","Owner":"Government agencies, economic research organizations"},{"Description":"Tax system modifications may lead to welfare losses for high-income earners","Impact":"Welfare losses for high-income earners and potential impact on aggregate output","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough analysis of tax system changes and their impact on various income groups","Technologies":"Economic modeling and simulation tools","People":"Policy makers, economists, tax authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, economic research organizations"}]}
